title: You're Too Careless with Your Kisses!

sources.title: You're Too Careless with Your Kisses! (1932)
sources.description: You’re Too Careless with Your Kisses! is a 1932 Merrie Melodies short directed by Rudolf Ising. Watch on RetroFlix.org:  https://retroflix.org/youre-too-careless-with-your-kisses-1932/

metadata.Plot: A bee returns home late after a night out having too much honey. His wife leaves him, but quickly ends up in the clutches of an evil ladybug. The whole hive turns out to fight the ladybug and get her back.
metadata.Actors: Rudolf Ising, Johnny Murray, The Rhythmettes
